title: Hey Riot, my birthday was Wednesday and I only ask for one gift from you guys.
body:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/129451465340092416/312733646069039105/35d388d184bf0038d2bc4c20f8909806.png

I drew it myself so you guys can get an idea of what I want. As somebody who wants to enjoy the game without being one shot with a single set of rotations at level 6 this would make me so happy!

If this isn't possible I'll also accept that you remove him from the game instead.

This would be an awesome gift. Thank you guys.

**EDIT:** Sorry I've seemed to make some Fizz players upset. Here's a Special Message to make it up to you all:

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=46TFyH0EovQ

replies.body: If Fizz is so OP why don't you just pick him?
Because then you would be a Fizz player.

Better a Fizz player than a crybaby that always whines about it....

P.S. You can exchange Fizz in either comment for when a person cries about any champ being OP just exchange the name and the point still fits.
Have you ever considered that people just don't enjoy playing the champion? That's basically the whole point.
Have you ever considered that is only the opinion of people that get shit on by him? Like playing to win is the whole point.
You're not even close to correct. There are plenty of people that don't want to play Fizz or play against him. We have a ban system for a reason.

There are also a lot of people that like to play fizz and also people that play him because he is a strong pick. So why should your opinion outweigh those of the people that adapt to the strength of a champion?

> [{quoted}](name=MisterSki,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mKA0wetE,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-12T23:55:21.696+0000)
>
> There are also a lot of people that like to play fizz and also people that play him because he is a strong pick. So why should your opinion outweigh those of the people that adapt to the strength of a champion?

Not every one wants to be a metaslave
So therefor any meta champ should immediately be gutted. Seems like a great starting point for ruining a game.
Come on man, you're in memes and games.  We like a low salt diet here.
{{champion:126}} {{champion:236}} if gutting meta champs pushes these 2 fucks into the gutter im cool with that
What a wonderful world it would be without seeing Jayce and Lucian.
I'd be fine with just Jayce ceasing to exist. We need Lucian for the Thresh memes. Jayce serves no memes.
can we break lucians fucking knees at least?

> [{quoted}](name=MisterSki,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mKA0wetE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-12T23:48:18.178+0000)
>
> Better a Fizz player than a crybaby that always whines about it....
> 
> P.S. You can exchange Fizz in either comment for when a person cries about any champ being OP just exchange the name and the point still fits.

Not everyone likes that champ and it leaves bad impressions on people's minds when they play against it
Hey there dude, you seem to still be in "Gameplay" mentality. May I suggest changing your mindset to "Memes and Games" (or maybe just memes now...) before commenting. Please and thank you.
If you take the time to read some of the idiotic responses you can tell that this isn't simply a meme.... So how about you read more context before making yourself look foolish? Thanks.
http://gifrific.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/why-so-serious-dark-knight.gif
Dude...this is the memes section of the boards...did it ever occur to you that we're just messing with and then laughing as you flame?
mate you need a snickers
Because I don't hate myself yet. Maybe after 5 more games against Fizz I'll try him though. Just so I don't have to go against him though.
Makes no sense. If something is so strong just play it or learn how to play against it.

I know how to play against Fizz on a basic level, but this doesn't mean that:

1. My teammates know how to.

2. He isn't broken.

It's like there's this thing called a chat function that lets you communicate with your team... Seeing as how concise you can be on the issue you should have no trouble explaining it in game to your team...

Yeah let me just write the whole essay in the first minute of the game telling my teammates how to play against Fizz in every situation.

You're extremely ignorant if you think this is possible. If everything was this black and white Fizz wouldn't be destroying now would he?

So because there are lazy people that don't practice or read articles on champions we need to placate their weaknesses?

You are extremely sad if you think that. Let's just nerf everyone to where each person has the same skills same stats and the only thing that differs is the appearance...

Not everyone takes the game seriously enough to read articles on how to lane and play against Fizz. I'm not saying we should make it so those people can play against him without having knowledge, but you can't just expect people to be able to play against him after reading a couple lines of text from a team mate on how to play against him. Which is the whole point of your argument of how your team mates should know how to play against him.

Know champion should get nerfed because someone doesn't understand how to play against them. The problem is is that there really isn't a good way to play against Fizz. If you poke him early you end up shoving the wave towards his side and if you freeze the wave you'll end up getting dove by jungle and Fizz. He doesn't have very many weaknesses.
Umm then why doesn't fizz have an incredible win rate? Apparently somebody has learned how to deal with it. Get better.

And Fiddle mid has a 55% win rate. Guess we should nerf him right?

This isn't about a champion's win rate. This is about somebody's kit being unhealthy for the game.

I also don't think somebody worse should be telling me to get better.
Yeah that's not it at all. People not liking to play against a champ is NEVER a reason to nerf it. Trust me that is a slippery slope that nobody should want to endorse or go down.

I worded that poorly and agree with you on your statement that people not liking a champion could be used as a reason to nerf something, but I was just making a general statement about champions like Yasuo that seemed to get nerfed whether he is or isn't broken.

Fizz however is in a whole different ball park. 2nd highest ban rate in the game, if you're saying that "nerfing a champion based on people not wanting to play against it is a fine idea." I don't know why you would be against nerfing Fizz.
The reasons brought up for his nerf are simply weak complaints in my opinion. The game is about winning if people think that Fizz is unfair and therefor ban worthy then why not pick him and abuse it?
@Tattersall Are you talking to me or him?

Okay, I don't know if this argument is still going, so I'm gonna go ahead and say this.  Your arguments are good and his are terrible.  There are two possibilities:
1.  He's a troll and he's literally only trying to anger as many people as possible.
2.  He's an idiot.
Whichever option he is, he doesn't deserve further responses.

What complaints are you talking about that are weak?

League is not just about winning, that's the major concept of the game, but you can have fun too, or not play broken shit and still win etc.

People do actually pick Fizz and abuse him. People do that already, they have been doing that for a while now. Not everyone is going to pick Fizz either from: lack of knowledge how to play him and/or just don't want to play him.

> [{quoted}](name=MisterSki,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mKA0wetE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-12T23:45:45.683+0000)
>
> If Fizz is so OP why don't you just pick him?

No one wants to be that guy that people hate

> [{quoted}](name=NGNL Asian,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mKA0wetE,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-05-12T23:47:23.635+0000)
>
> No one wants to be that guy that people hate

I beg to differ :p
Your name is a reference to the anime The Devil is a part timer?

> [{quoted}](name=Veltox,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mKA0wetE,comment-id=0000000100010000,timestamp=2017-05-13T05:31:42.124+0000)
>
> Your name is a reference to the anime The Devil is a part timer?

Yeah Sadaou maou

Fry cook op :P
Was that a question or a statement.
Was _that_ a question or a statement?

Literally if you ask high elo players too, even they say that fizz is just a champ where if you make a mistake after his powerspikes, you pretty much just die. It's more punishing than any other mid laner
Also no point in playing lb if fizz exist. No burst delay, good escape. More damage shorter CD's.

> [{quoted}](name=RainbowIcee,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mKA0wetE,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-05-13T15:08:25.944+0000)
>
> Also no point in playing lb if fizz exist. No burst delay, good escape. More damage shorter CD's.

have you ever read fizz's w, it has a higher delay then leblancs thing xd

what are you talking about? hitting them with the shark and then auto attacking for triple damage is a longer delay than 4 seconds? or what do you mean? explain? 
Also he doesn't even need the triple damage to kill someone he can just go in and do it.
But you aren't in much risk because of your troll pole.
